name: Alone (itch) (FrStudios)
description:
Demonstration of the first level:

Just an interesting game concept I came up with and threw a game together about in like 10 hours for an entrance exam for a university, grab it if you feel like it. Better games coming soon I promise haha. The concept is it's a maze where you don't know where you are or the walls, so you use a gun to shoot the walls so you can see approximately where you are and where the wall is, as the light makes the wall stay showing. You have limited bullets and you have to get all the rocks.
